name: hygienically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is clean, especially in order to prevent disease: These vegetables are hygienically processed and packed to retain their nutritional value. Everything is hygienically wrapped, tested by health inspectors, and kept at a low temperature.
More examplesFewer examplesThey were fined £4,000 for failing to store the cheese and meat hygienically.You are allowed to sell these natural remedies if you can show that they were produced safely and hygienically.The box contained several rolls of bandages, hygienically sealed in white paper.
